PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1991-15971991-08-260,  ,  ,  PMO, 
PrecisOrder directing that a Commission under the Great Seal of Canada do issue appointing the following persons to conduct an inquiry and report upon the evolution of the relationship among aboriginal peoples (Indian, Inuit and Métis), the Canadian government and Canadian society, which inquiry shall be known as the ROYAL COMMISSION ON ABORIGINAL PEOPLES. . 1. Hon./L'hon. Allan Emrys Blakeney 2. Paul Chartrand 3. Hon./L'hon René Dussault - Chairperson/président 4. Georges Erasmus - Chairperson/président 5. Viola Robinson 6. Mary Sillett 7. Hon./L'hon. Bertha Wilson 8. Jean T. Fournier - Executive Director/directeur exécutif .
Attachments
precis:
Order directing that a Commission under the Great Seal of Canada do issue
appointing the following persons to conduct an inquiry and report upon the
evolution of the relationship among aboriginal peoples (Indian, Inuit and
Métis), the Canadian government and Canadian society, which inquiry shall
be known as the ROYAL COMMISSION ON ABORIGINAL PEOPLES.
.
  1. Hon./L'hon. Allan Emrys Blakeney
  2. Paul Chartrand
  3. Hon./L'hon René Dussault - Chairperson/président
  4. Georges Erasmus          - Chairperson/président
  5. Viola Robinson
  6. Mary Sillett
  7. Hon./L'hon. Bertha Wilson
  8. Jean T. Fournier - Executive Director/directeur exécutif
.
